summary: Chronicles the last great American showman, filmmaker William Castle, a master of ballyhoo who became a brand name in movie horror with his outrageous audience participation gimmicks.
cast: Forrest J. Ackerman|John Badham|Diane Baker|Sidney D. Balkin|Steve Bickel|Robert Bloch|Budd Boetticher|Bob Burns|Kathy Burns|Terry Castle|William Castle|Harry Cohn|Roger Corman|Joan Crawford|Joe Dante|David Del Valle|Ralph Edwards|Mia Farrow|Donald F. Glut|Stuart Gordon|Cary Grant|Anne Helm|Darryl Hickman|Alfred Hitchcock|Adolf Hitler|Norman Horowitz|William J. Immerman|Richard Kahn|Jacqueline Kennedy|John F. Kennedy|Hawk Koch|John Landis|Gene Lesser|Pamela Lincoln|Marcia Scully Little|Barry Lorie|Bela Lugosi|Leonard Maltin|Marcel Marceau|Marilyn Nash|Kyle Newell|Will Newell|Steven North|Thomas Page|Roman Polanski|Vincent Price|Fred Olen Ray|Paul Sammon|Michael Schlesinger|Jacqueline Scott|Ruth Scully|Jeannot Szwarc|Bob Thomas|John Waters|Orson Welles|Robb White
keywords: exploitation filmmaking|psychotronic filmmaking|grindhouse filmmaking|film director|film producer
title: Spine Tingler! The William Castle Story
